## C Sudoku Solver Project Instructions

This project implements a Sudoku solver in C using the backtracking algorithm. The solver can solve standard 9x9 Sudoku puzzles efficiently.

### Project Structure
- `src/` - Source files
- `include/` - Header files  
- `examples/` - Sample Sudoku puzzles
- `Makefile` - Build configuration

### Code Guidelines
- Follow clean C coding practices
- Use clear variable names and comments
- Implement proper error handling
- Memory management best practices
- Use standard C libraries only

### Algorithm
- Backtracking algorithm for solving puzzles
- Input validation for puzzle format
- Pretty printing of solved puzzles
- Support for multiple puzzle formats
